practice_phrases.target: I'm going to speak more today.
I want to speak with you more.
I want to speak English a little more.

practice_phrases.known: 我很快就要开始多说话了。
practice_phrases.target: I'm going to start speaking more soon.

practice_phrases.known: 因为我想学习，所以我想多练习。
practice_phrases.target: Because I want to learn, I want to practise more.

practice_phrases.known: 我猜我今天晚上要多和人说话。
practice_phrases.target: I guess I'm going to speak with people more this evening.

practice_phrases.known: 我想和会说英语的人多说话。
practice_phrases.target: I want to speak more with people who speak English.
